Your go–to destination for a fully customizable and satisfying dining experience! At Craft Your Feast, we believe food should be an adventure, and we\’re here to make every meal exciting, convenient, and delicious. Our Story
Craft Your Feast was born from a passion for creating meals that are not only visually appealing but also made with fresh, high–quality ingredients. We bring a new twist to bento–style dining, allowing you to mix and match your favorite flavors, ensuring a meal tailored to your taste. Whether you\'re a food lover or a picky eater, we\’ve got something special for you! Our Mission
We aim to provide a delightful, personalized meal experience while maintaining the highest standards of hygiene, freshness, and customer service. Through innovation and integrity, we strive to bring you mouthwatering, well–balanced meals that fit your preferences and lifestyle. Find us Visit us! We\'re located at STI College, Rosario, Cavite craftyourfeast@gmail.com 0994–6456–114 Connect & Follow Personal Details Verify email This is how we will address you Changing password? These Terms and Conditions shall apply to all orders of Craft Your Feast products (“Products”) of a customer through this Craft Your Feast Pick–up Mobile application. By placing an order for Products through this Mobile application, you understand, agree with, and accept: (i) these Terms and Conditions and any corresponding changes there to which we may implement from time to time; and (ii) our Privacy Policy in connection with how we process your personal information collected from this Site For purposes of these Terms and Conditions, “Craft Your Feast”, “our” or “we” shall refer to Craft Your Feast Corporation, while “customer” or “you” shall refer to the customer who intends to purchase the Products from this Mobile application.
I. Territories Covered You understand and agree that this Mobile application can only service the following areas, depending on the Order Fulfillment Option chosen. If your area is not within the Pick–up Area below, you may visit the nearest Craft Your Feast booth. Pick Up Area Craft Your Feast offers Pick–up services only within Metro Manila, Bulacan, Pampanga, Bataan, Tarlac, Nueva Ecija, Cavite, Laguna, Batangas, Rizal (Cainta, Antipolo, Taytay, Angono and San Mateo), Cebu, Bacolod, Iloilo, Davao, Cagayan de Oro and selected areas of Baguio, Ilocos Norte, Ilocos Sur, Nueva Vizcaya, Zambales, La Union, Quezon Province, Bicol, Mindoro, Palawan, Tagbilaran, Calbayog, Tacloban/Ormoc, Dumaguete, Antique, General Santos, Zamboanga, Bukidnon, Butuan, Surigao, and Iligan. The customer selects the store where order will be picked up. You cannot change the pick up store once transaction is confirmed.
II. Account Creation If you decide to place an order through this Mobile application, you will be asked to register/sign up by creating an account which requires your personal information such as username, email address and a password. Creating an account allows you to automatically fill–up all the necessary pick–up details in your next order. Inputting and confirming a password on the “Create an Account” section of the Mobile application, along with other information, allows you to make an account. You must keep this password confidential and must not disclose it to anyone. If you believe someone else knows your password, please change your password immediately. We reserve the right to suspend your registration if you violate any of these Terms and Conditions. If you wish to order as guest, the Mobile application will require you to sign up/log in on every use of the ordering platform. The information you provide will only be used for purpose of the pertinent pick–up and for any subsequent issues on payment. If another person used your account to order Products on your behalf, with or without your knowledge, such order shall be subject to these Terms and Conditions, and you agree that the order shall be considered your own and will be charged to you.
III. Fulfillment of Order The online order submitted through this ordering platform will be fulfilled via pick–up only. The pick–up order is fulfilled either through Craft Your Feast pick–up services which we may engage. We reserve the right to revise or add order fulfillment options in the future.
IV. Submission of Order Upon submission of your online order, you are authorizing us to process your online order and preparation of the Products you have specified on your order form. However, we reserve the right to refuse the processing of your order without any notification should we find any incorrect or incomplete details, or any previous spurious transactions with the given personal information. Also, non–response to SMS and calls from either store may result to late or non–processing of the Products and should not be taken against us. Additional verification call or confirmation call may be required to proceed with your order.
V. Regular Order (Pick–up) By submitting your order via pick–up through this website, you understand and agree that the processing of your order is subject to the following conditions: The minimum food purchase for a pick–up transaction is P10.00. For Orders amounting to P1,101.00 and up you will receive a call from our store to verify your identity and your order details. Due to the volume of the Products ordered, we do not guarantee that orders will be ready within the 45–minute processing period and the store will coordinate with you on the pick–up serving time. Excessive requests of items such as main dish, sides, sauce, and desserts are subject to store discretion. Orders above P5,500.00, are considered bulk orders and will not be accepted by the Mobile application.
VI. Advance Order (Pick–up) You may order in advance through this website by choosing your preferred date and time.
VII. Order Acceptance and Confirmation The acceptance of orders for the Products made through the Mobile application shall be at the entire discretion of Craft Your Feast. We reserve the right to decline to accept the order of the Products without giving any reason. For Pick–up, our acceptance of an order occurs when you receive an on–screen message pop up confirming that your order has been placed (“Order Confirmation”). The Delivery Order Confirmation is a record of our agreement to deliver the Products you ordered and your obligation to pay the price of the Products in full. The Order Confirmation for Pick–up will contain the following information: Pick–up:
Your pertinent order number; The date and time of your order; The total amount payable; The Craft Your Feast booth that has received and will process your order; and The contact number of the Craft Your Feast booth that has received your order.
VIII. Cancellation of Orders Orders may be cancelled within the "Preparing your order" stage from the time that the order was placed by placing your order to the Craft Your Feast Mobile application that received your order. Cancellation immediately after the "Preparing your order" stage from the time that the Order Confirmation was received will no longer be valid. You understand and agree that cancellation beyond the 5th minute will require you to pay the full amount of the order placed by you. We reserve the right to refuse any cancellation in case the order has already been dispatched for delivery prior to receipt of your request for cancellation. We reserve the right to refuse any cancellation in case the order has already been prepared for pick up to receipt of your request for cancellation. If payment is made via E–payment and the cancellation of order was successful, it will be your responsibility to contact the issuing bank to cancel the payment made.
IX. Prices and Payment Unless otherwise stated in writing, the Product prices quoted on this Mobile application are inclusive of value–added taxes, any other applicable taxes and delivery charge. The Product prices on this Mobile application are subject to change with prior notice. To check the price/s of the Product you want to order, please click the Checkout button to see the breakdown and total amount due. You can pay by any of the following methods:
Cash upon pick–up Cash mode of payment on–site.
Cashless upon pick–up Cashless mode of payment on–site (Gcash), subject to the condition that onsite Gcash payment may not be available 24 hours. Cashless payment on–site will involve a redirection to a third–party payment gateway. You acknowledge that Craft Your Feast will not be responsible for any information provided in the payment gateway. If your order is placed using a E–payment, the receipt should be valid on the date of delivery of your order. We reserve our right to refuse to prepare any order if for whatever reason we believe that payment will be refused at any stage.
X. Refund In case of a refund, any refund for payments made in cash would need to be processed by our Customer Services team. Refunds for orders paid online via E–payment must be processed by you through your issuing bank.
XI. Limitation of Liability We shall not be liable for any loss, expense, cost or damage arising directly or indirectly out of or in connection with: (i) your use of this Mobile application; or (ii) the delay beyond the estimated time of pick up; or (iii) availability of product/s at any given time; or (iv) force majeure; or (v) any circumstances beyond our control, and over which we could not have avoided even with the exercise of reasonable care, or any indirect or unforeseeable loss suffered or incurred by customers or third parties. In any event, our liability for any given transaction shall not exceed the total price charged for the relevant items. The Products ordered should be consumed within one (1) hour from their actual receipt. We will not be liable for any event that may arise as a result/consequence of consuming the Products beyond the specified time.
XII. Intellectual Property This website and/or application contains the CRAFT YOUR FEAST, logos, and other trademarks, service marks, product names, designs, titles, words or phrases, graphics and logos used in connection with the Mobile application (Collectively, the “Trademarks”), including, all text, images, photographs, illustrations, data, and/or other related information, and other materials featured, displayed, contained and available in and on the Mobile application (collectively, the “Content”), are owned by or licensed to Craft Your Feast. The Trademarks, Content and related proprietary property are protected from copying and imitation under national and international laws and are not to be used, reproduced, adapted (whether in its original form or derivations thereof), or copied, in whole or in part, without the express written permission of Craft Your Feast. Third parties are not allowed to use the Trademarks and Content in any manner, of for any other purposes, commercial or otherwise, without Craft Your Feast prior express written consent.
XIII. Privacy Policy Our Privacy Policy, and any changes there to which we may implement from time to time, in connection with how we process your personal information collected from this Mobile application may be found in the Privacy Policy. You agree that with your acceptance of these Terms and Conditions, you have read, understood and accepted our Privacy Policy.
XIV. User Data Deletion You may delete your personal information in our secured internal database, by going to your profile.
XV. Updating these Terms and Conditions Whenever necessary, we may, from time to time, update and/or revise these Terms and Conditions. We shall inform you of any update or revision by placing the date of the latest version on top of these Terms and Conditions.
XVI. Miscellaneous Provisions These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and interpreted in accordance with Philippine law. In case of disputes, the venue for any action shall be the proper courts of Pasig City to the exclusions of all other venues. Failure of Craft Your Feast Corporation to enforce a particular term or condition does not constitute a waiver of that term or condition by Craft Your Feast, and shall not be construed as a waiver or variation of it or preclude its exercise at any subsequent time. If any of the terms and conditions is held to be invalid or unenforceable, then such terms or condition shall, so far as it is invalid or unenforceable, be given no effect and shall be deemed not to be included in these Terms and Conditions, but without invalidating any of the remaining provisions.

//MENU DESCRIPTION This bento box features crispy chicken karaage, fluffy rice, refreshing corn slaw, and a soft mochi for dessert, served with water. This bento box features flavorful tuna sisig, paired with rice, a crispy hashbrown, and a mochi for dessert, complemented by refreshing coffee jelly. This bento box includes savory veggie balls, sweet corn, and a delicate Japanese fruit cake for dessert, paired with refreshing cucumber lemon juice.
